title: Is it possible to get more refunds?
body: Just a question regarding refunds since apparently I'm a bit of a goober. Is it possible to get another refund even if we've used all 3? I'm asking because I actually was supposed to gift my gf the new Lux skin but accidentally bought it for myself. I don't want the skin since I don't really play Lux at all so I really just would rather get the RP back and gift her it instead of having to put down another 25$.

replies.body:
Eeek, that really sucks! Unfortunately, we have a pretty strict [*Refund Policy*](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751864-Content-Refund-FAQ) that really allow exceptions outside of using the three tokens your account is provided at creation.

I feel for you since I've made my fair share of misclicks or mispurchases in games(I'm a pretty clumsy person), and I really wish there was something more we could do. Please let me know if you have any other questions.
